name: Bakkal - Contemporary Market
description: "... one of the most un-anticipated market-runner games of the year ... [Bakkal - Contemporary Market] is a love letter from a generation of avid market-goers, to a very contemporary market ... Deep and open ended story, as well as the technical breakthrough to achieve this masterpiece, sheds a bright light to the problems of common day-to-day contemporary market dwellers and their complex lives ..." - Anonymous
